description: As taken from the HITRUST CSF, this section cover strategic risk managment items. Specifically in this cluster, the tags deal with the development and management of organizational supply chains.
name: SUPPLY-CHAIN

values.description: Information security requirements for mitigating the risks associated with supplier’s access to the organization’s assets are agreed with the supplier and documented.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Strategic Framework: 11.a Information Security in Supplier Relationships
